release_notes.en-US: - Bumped version support
- Now supporting eMusic Remote ( http://developer.emusic.com/ ) - Tested Mozilla Firefox 3.0 Betas - Tested on Lightning/Calendar 0.8pre - Bumped SeaMonkey to 2.0a1

- added a new menu option
- added new and improved locales
- new icon support

Quick Fix:

- resolved some problems with the new options.
- fixed some locale problems.

Changes:

- 2 new options.
- a lot of new and fixed locales.
- various bug fixes.

Changes:

- Fixed bug with Radio Icons replacing extension icons.
- Added a Donation button to the options window.
- Added locales:

cs-CZ
de-DE
en-GB
en-US
fr-FR
it-IT
nl-NL
pt-BR
ru-RU
sk-SK

- New option to hide the "Go" button.
- New option to hide the "Search" button.
- Added generic icon for the History menu
- The Options window has been re-done
- Added a warning note in the flatstyle options tab
- Icons for "Open All In Tabs..." & "Manage Search Engines..." now show in all languages
- "about" window is now in the new options window
- Added an option to turn the CuteMenus icons on/off
- Reduced the size of the "ticks" a little to match the crosses to make them look in proportion
- Generic icons for the back & forward drop down menus
- Added icons to the Bookmark menu's RSS submenu
- New flaystyle option to make it more like office.
- Revised flatstyle code for less bugs.
- New option to turn on/off ticks n crosses
- New option to turn on/off radio items

Known Bugs:

- Limited Mac Support

- Reduced the margins on menu bar items a little for consistency.
- Adjusted the size of menu popup mouseovers. They were a bit too tall.
- Icon backgrounds in menus now match the current Window theme. This includes Luna style themes.
- Menu items will now align properly reguardless of whether or not they have the iconic class assigned to them.
- Completed support in Minefield and Sunbird/Calendar.
- Fixed an issue that caused the DOM Inspector for Minefield and Calendar nightly builds to display double arrows on submenus.
- Fixed some issues with tool bar menu buttons.
- Fixed an issue that affected Update Notifier's tool bar button.
- Menus will now be consistent across applications.
- New Extension Icon code.

Changes:

- Fixed some problems with the menus when flatstyle is enabled, the bar down the left of the menus wasn't showing up for some users.
- Added a lot of new icon code.
- Fixed the context menu separators

First of all i'd like to thank everyone on the forum who helped us through the testing cycle on this release, we had a lot of new features added and the dev builds had over 1,200 downloads in total with a lot of feed back and bug reports. Now, on to the changes since 1.6:

- Fixed compatibility with certain themes and icons.
- Added new code for extension icons from user submission's area on the forum.
- Completed SeaMonkey Support.
- Works in Sunbird Nightlies.
- Added a menu item in "Tools" for the cutemenus option, we also added an option to enable/disable this menu item.
- Fully implemented the "Flatstyle" extension into the options menu, this is now called "Microsoft Office XP/2003 Style" and has several options for the theme.
- Re-arranged the options window a little for all these new options.
- Added "Storm" to the "About" window, crediting him for converting the old Firefox 1.5 Flatstyle code into working Firefox 2 Office XP Style.

- Works in SeaMonkey now!!
- The first option has been added to the options window, this is related to a our new method of how users can add their own icons, details will be in the Tutorial when it is released.
- fixed problems with various styles
- maxed out Flock support

fixed messed up icons in Thunderbird
fixed default tab bar context menu icons in firefox(finally)
fixed various messed up extension icons
fixed maxversion numbers for netscape and sunbird
completed sunbird support
cleaned redundant code
improved icons for adblock and gmail manager
added various new icons to firefox such as popup blocker and undo tabs list.
fixed a lot of bugs from v1.5...

Changes:

Reduced size by 70kb (250kb > 180kb) - peprio
Added support for Wizz RSS sidebar - Static_Rage
ANY NEW PROGRAM WINDOW OR SIDEBAR CAN NOW HAVE ICONS ADDED TO IT!! (before i had to find the xul link and manually add it the the extension - thanks peprio).
All icons have a reduced loading time and size thanks to the new "mosaic" png file. - peprio
Code has a faster loading time and will now NEVER have a duplicate entries - peprio
Other random icons have been filled in.

Firefox 2 support.
Tab Mix Plus improvements.
removed duplicate icons.

more thunderbird icons, a couple more firefox extensions and some code fixes.
added right click icons for the address bar and the tabs, fixed icons for 1.0.x but only works for en-US as it is dependant on locale.
Massive updates to the code, icons have been changed, new ones added. The code improvements make loading times way faster, and makes it easier for me to add new icons, pray to mr tech for new code.

Added a few new icons, improved code resulting in faster loads.
